quotes.quote: Dollar bill: people spend their whole life seeking to earn it, but won't spend 10 minutes seeking to learn it.
Don't underestimate the power of one dollar for somewhere in its generation is million, billion and trillion.
For every dollar you give away, you'll get a hundred back. And for every buck you steal, you'll lose a thousand.
The dollar sign is the only sign in which the modern man appears to have any real faith.
When you have one million dollars, you're a lucky person. When you have 10 million dollars, you've got trouble, a lot of headaches.
Whenever the dollar is held supreme and capitalistic interests dominate, a higher value will always be placed upon property rights than upon human rights.
There is nothing more nervous than a million dollars - it moves very fast, and it doesn't speak any language.
A dollar saved is a quarter earned.
A dollar won is twice as sweet as a dollar earned.
Treat each federal dollar as if it was hard earned; it was - by a taxpayer.
Dollar bills have absolutely no value except in our collective imagination, but everybody believes in the dollar bill.
Every dollar the government doesn't spend, tax, or borrow is a dollar that businesses and families can spend or invest themselves.
The way to make a million dollars is to start a religion.
Dollars and guns are no substitutes for brains and will power.
Nothing that costs only a dollar is not worth having.
No one makes a million dollars with minimal effort unless they win the lottery.
There are only three things you can do with a dollar: spend, loan, or own.
When you have millions of dollars, you have millions of friends.
Nobody gives twenty-five million dollars to anybody if they're not getting twenty-five million worth out of it. Forget it. It just doesn't happen.
Every dollar that is printed should not represent a debt to private bankers. It should represent an investment potential in the common good, in the common needs of our country.
The dollars aren't so important... once you have them.
No man can add one dollar to his bank account by worrying.
It is as easy to manifest one dollar as it is to manifest one million dollars.
A million dollars isn’t cool. You know what’s cool? A billion dollars.
A dollar is not worth as much as you think it is. Your honesty is worth much more.
No man should receive a dollar unless that dollar has been fairly earned.
The first dollar is the most you will get if you don't love what you are doing.
The dollar is the reserve currency of the world.
The value of a dollar is social, as it is created by society.
A strong dollar reflects a strong country and a strong economy, and we need to make sure that we get the - stop the practice of devaluing the dollar.
Why pay a dollar for a bookmark? Why not use the dollar for a bookmark?
Every dollar released from taxation that is spared or invested will help create a new job and a new salary.
